description:
Surprise! It's Tuesday and I thought I would spring a hot hairy guy on you named Colton!
Colton is a little guy, not real tall, but you can tell he packs a lot of sexual energy in his small frame.
He is into dudes, and especially likes to have his ass fucked. He's got a dirty streak that had me dripping in my britches.
The photos are even hot as you see his dick started oozing pre-cum for the photos. A great start of a very sexually tense video. Needless to say, you can tell he enjoyed showing off for you all.
Hairy guys are hard to find, and I know many of you dig them, so I hope you enjoy this one!
title: Colton - Solo
